entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
